ImageFunction.fillRect

機能/意味
Rectangle fill
タイプ
ImageFunctionクラスのメソッド
構文
fillRect(bmp, value, rect=null, isalpha=true, cliprect=null)
引数
bmp 　Specifies the Bitmap object to fill.
value 　Specify the fill color and value.
　The meaning of this value depends on the value of isalpha.
true : Specify opacity and color in 0xAARRGGBB format. Both the main and the mask are filled.
false : Please specify the color in 0xRRGGBB format.
rect 　The rectangle to fill, in pixels (at the image location), specified as a Rect object.
　If not specified, the entire target is used.
isalpha 　Specifies whether to have an alpha channel.
cliprect 　Specify the clipping area with a Rect object (at the bitmap image position).
　If not specified, the entire target is used.
戻り値
なし (void)
説明
　Fills the specified Bitmap image rectangle with the specified method.
